abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33977298, pmid33977301, pmid33880519, pmid34011029, pmid33914014, pmid33303539, pmid32785710, pmid34081630, pmid33993274, pmid33843975, pmid33983522, pmid33893489, pmid33440088
